title: Ticket #1097: cannot submit with USE_VOMS_ATTRIBUTES=False
description:
In 7.4.1, I get the following error from condor_submit when submitting a gt2 grid universe job if I configure USE_VOMS_ATTRIBUTES=False: 

ERROR "Assertion ERROR on (val)" at line 7046 in file submit.cpp

The stack looks like this: 

#0  0x080f6d7e in InsertJobExprString ()
#1  0x080f35d7 in SetGSICredentials ()
#2  0x080f47f3 in queue ()
#3  0x080f3d90 in read_condor_file ()
#4  0x080e709f in main ()
check_ins: 2010-Mar-23 16:09   Check-in [17685]: fixed condor_submit so it functions even when USE_VOMS_ATTRIBUTES == False (ticket #1097) (By Zach Miller )
creator: danb
